title: How an al-Qaeda offshoot became one of Africa's deadliest militant groups
description: JNIM has emerged as the deadliest jihadist group in West Africa as armies struggle to stem the attacks.
content:
Priya Sippy & Jacob BoswallBBC News & BBC Monitoring
Al-Qaeda affiliate Jama'at Nusrat al-Islam wal-Muslimin (JNIM) is the main group behind a surge in militant jihadist attacks sweeping acr… [+9951 chars]
